thread.title: Arkansas Symphony, Cirque performers create once in a lifetime event

title: Arkansas Symphony, Cirque performers create once in a lifetime event
text:

Post to Facebook Arkansas Symphony, Cirque performers create once in a lifetime event Cirque Musica: Crescendo is an all new symphonic cirque experience, featuring international cirque artists and a full symphony orchestra.  //on.kthv.com/1LLVPAC   Join the Conversation To   Arkansas Symphony, Cirque performers create once in a lifetime event THV11 Staff, news source 1:11 p.m. CDT October 21, 2015 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Cirque Musica: Crescendo is an all new symphonic cirque experience, featuring international cirque artists and a full symphony orchestra. --THV11.com 10/21/15 KTHV 
LITTLE ROCK, Ark. (KTHV) â€“ Cirque Musica: Crescendo is an all new symphonic cirque experience, featuring international cirque artists and a full symphony orchestra. 
The performance run Saturday at 7:30 p.m. and Sunday at 3 p.m. at the Connor Performing Arts Center 
Arkansas Symphony Orchestra Executive Director Christina Little-John came to THV11 to talk more about the once in a lifetime concert event. For more information, watch the video attached to this story, or go to ArkansasSymphony.org: http://on.kthv.com/1GpUXB6
